price: Mose kaa sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, fa me ne me nua (Aaron) bͻne kyε yεn na fa yεn wura W’ahummͻborͻ no mu, na Wone ahummͻborͻ mu Ahummͻborͻ Hene no.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِي وَلِأَخِي وَأَدۡخِلۡنَا فِي رَحۡمَتِكَۖ وَأَنتَ أَرۡحَمُ ٱلرَّٰحِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi igh'fir lī wali-akhī wa-adkhil'nā fī raḥmatika wa-anta arḥamu al-rāḥimīna
